The Save 418 Movement

We are the teapots.

Error Code 418 states that

Any attempt to brew coffee with a teapot should result in the error code "418 I'm a teapot". The resulting entity body MAY be short and stout.

See RFC2324 Section 2.3.2
The application of such an error code is boundless. Its utility, quite simply, is astonishingly unparalleled. So I implore you to help thwart this conniving Node.js contributor. Who now also seeks to have 418 expunged from Go, over here. Evidently ASP.net as well, here. Also Python's Requests, over here. Express your concerns regarding the ramifications of removing such a wonderful error code from the internet. Before its too late. #SAVE418 Contact Us: save418movement [at] gmail.com
